articles.title: Monroe woman accidentally given saline instead of COVID-19 vaccine - WRAL.com
articles.description: Lisa Strawn has plenty of questions after she said she and her husband walked into the Walgreens on Fincher Street in Monroe on March 20 and got what they thought was the Pfizer vaccine.
